text: UCN may stand for: *Ultracold Neutrons *Universal Character Name, as in the ISO 8859 standard, Unicode, C99, or C++. *Universidad Católica del Norte, a university in Antofagasta, Chile *University College of the North, a university college in Manitoba, Canada *Central University of Nicaragua, a private and nonprofit university, Nicaragua *University College of Northern Denmark, a university in Denmark *Urocortin, a human gene *UCN, the IATA Airport Code for Buchanan Airport *Ultimate Custom Night, the video game
title: UCN
